bug.author: yueguoguo
bug.summary: [BUG] Maven coordinate of microsoft:sarplus:0.2.6 is not found
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
The maven coordinate of microsoft:sarplus:0.2.6 cannot be found. <denchmark-h:h3>In which platform does it happen?</denchmark-h>
Azure Databricks <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the issue?</denchmark-h>
Follow the instructions of cluster set up on Azure Databricks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/recommenders/tree/master/contrib/sarplus>here</denchmark-link> failed because the maven cannot be found, which in turn, resulted in an installation failure. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/eisber>@eisber</denchmark-link> esiber:sarplus:0.2.6 works well - so probably we just need to update the instruction or publicize a replicate of the original maven.
